name: AR Pulling Chained Truck
description:
Help another driver get out of trouble in the AR Pulling Chained Truck. Using the technology of augmented reality allows you to turn the world around into one big level for the AR Pulling Chained Truck. Look for jammed cars, pull them out of the dirt with a hook, get coins for it and open new cars and levels.

* Game in augmented reality
* Large selection of cars
* Fast gameplay
